alert.note: Alert for Northern Monterey Bay; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 24 at 12:33AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Santa Cruz and west central Santa Clara Counties through 100 AM PST... At 1233 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Scotts Valley, or 8 miles south of Los Gatos, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Jose, Santa Cruz, Campbell, Saratoga, Los Gatos, Scotts Valley, Felton, Ben Lomond, Monte Sereno, Lexington Hills and Cambrian Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Monterey Bay; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains
